author: prbuzz.com
title: Tax Lien Experts Now Offers Phone Support!
text:
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE
July 9th, 2015
For more information, contact:
Tax Liens Experts
877-826-7419
http://governmenttaxliennetwork.com
Scottsdale, Arizona - (July 9th, 2015) ­– Tax Liens Experts has been voted the #1 source for tax lien certificate investing education! If you're interested in learning how to make lucrative, safe investments through tax lien and deed investing, then you've found the absolute finest resource available. If you're interested in buying tax liens the fastest and easiest way possible, then you're in the right place. They have opened up their company's personal inventory of tax liens to students and students are gobbling them up as fast as possible! If you sign up for a membership to Tax Liens Experts there are many benefits that you will receive, such as: a physical product that will teach you everything you need to know to get started, access to their stellar support team by phone, or by email to ask questions and get special tips and over 20 training videos that will go through each step in detail so that you have confidence every step of the way. You will also have access to county lists of tax liens and online auction links that are updated as they occur and access to their direct-buy tax lien certificates, which allow you to skip the county hassles and buy certificates easily. Additionally, with a membership, you can download special quick start documents and the actual physical kit files to access these materials anywhere. Tax lien investing has never been easier than it is with Tax Liens Experts. You can make 18% in Florida, 16% in Arizona, and up to 50% in Texas? And it is all government mandated. Give the Tax Liens Experts a call to help get you started. (877)-826-7419
